strings.title: üéà Loon Shooter üî´
strings.desktop_instructions1: Bust matching loons! Do not touch the line!
strings.desktop_instructions2: Move the Shooter by moving the mouse
strings.mobile_instructions1: Bust matching loons! Do not touch the line!
strings.mobile_instructions2: Drag left/right to rotate the shooter
strings.mobile_instructions3: Releasing your finger off to shoot!
strings.wentOutOfFrame: Lost that balloon? Lost a life!
strings.comboTexts: AWESOME ü§©, GREAT üëå, FANTASTIC ü§ü, WOW üòç, AMAZING üëè, NAILED IT üî•, WHATTA GUN SHOT! üî´, FU*K THE LOONS üñï

fields.name: Game Title
fields.description: The title that is displayed in the start menu

fields.name: Game Instructions 1
fields.description: This instruction appears on desktop devices only.

fields.name: Game Instructions 2
fields.description: This instruction appears on desktop devices only.

fields.name: Game Instructions 3
fields.description: This instruction appears on desktop devices only.

fields.name: Game Instructions 1
fields.description: This instruction appears on mobile devices only.

fields.name: Game Instructions 2
fields.description: This instruction appears on mobile devices only.

fields.name: Game Instructions 3
fields.description: This instruction appears on mobile devices only.

fields.name: Font Family
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the game

fields.name: Play Button Text
fields.description: Label on the Play Button

fields.name: Score Text
fields.description: Default: 'Score:'

fields.name: New Balloons Celebration Text
fields.description: Text that appears when all balloons are shot!

fields.name: Game Timer
fields.description: How many seconds before game should over?

fields.name: Line Touched Text
fields.description: Message that appears after balloon touches the line.

fields.name: Balloon Went Out Text
fields.description: Message that appears when balloon is lost out of the game.

fields.name: Use Colors?
fields.description: Disable if you want custom balloon images.

fields.name: High Score Text
fields.description: Default: 'High Score:'

fields.name: High Score Gained Text
fields.description: When you get a new high score

fields.name: Enable E-Mail Input
fields.description: Enable/Disable E-Mail input while submitting score.

fields.name: Life Text
fields.description: When you collect a life

fields.name: Weapon Text
fields.description: When you collect a weapon

fields.name: Starting Lives
fields.description: How many lives you initially have

fields.name: Max Lives
fields.description: How many lives you can have max

fields.name: Enemy Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often enemies will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Strong Enemy Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often strong enemies will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Life Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often life collectibles will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Weapon Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often weapon collectibles will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Enemy Average Speed
fields.description: How fast enemies will move on average (Integer)

fields.name: Draw Background Stars
fields.description: Whether to draw moving stars in the background

fields.name: Star Count
fields.description: How many stars to draw in the background, if enabled (Integer)

fields.name: Score Gain
fields.description: How many points you get for collectibles (Integer)

fields.name: Score Modifier For Destroyed Enemies
fields.description: How much the base score gain is multiplied after destroying an enemy with a shield (Integer)

fields.name: Enemy Number Size
fields.description: How much space the number is occupying relative to the enemy image (1-100)(Integer)

fields.name: Fire Cooldown
fields.description: How much time in MILISECONDS between each projectile
